title: UC-49 • The AI Agent Notes • The Confused Multi-Biz User (Sam)
description: Comprehensive lifecycle saga derived from UC-49 and persona P-8. Needs summary: Public notes (visible to all): "Allergic to lavender"; Private notes (provider only): "Difficult customer, be extra patient"; AI agent notes (system insights): "Tends to book last minute, send reminder 24h early"; Note permissions and visibility rules; AI learning from patterns; Note categories and searchability
objectives: Validate UC-49 lifecycle end-to-end using persona The Confused Multi-Biz User (Sam).
Exercise owner setup, team setup, catalog publishing, and customer journeys.
Stress ACL/security edge cases and verify expected denials are enforced.
Collect snapshots and report artifacts for every critical milestone.
